item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Fat Belly's Pub (where 3 Steeple Street "used to be")!

Last Fall, 3 Steeple Street suddenly closed much to the disappointment of many - BUT it re-opened as Fat Belly's Pub and has quickly become a favorite.  Fat Belly's is a local RI Pub chain (can you really call it that if its local?) with other locations in Wakefield, East Greenwich and Warwick. We were here in December & January of last year and it was great, so let's do it again!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Julia is graciously hosting this one, so look at her picture!
item.name: Monday Night Happy Hour - Fat Belly's Pub - Providence!
